alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 2:54PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL HUMBOLDT AND WEST CENTRAL TRINITY COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM PDT... At 253 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Hyampom, or 16 miles south of Willow Creek. $inString.substring(0,1).toUpperCase()$inString.substring(1).toLowerCase() nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Willow Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity
